definition: to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat

sentences.english: The Nadam Festival is a traditional occasion for Mongols to get together for a few days of festivity .
sentences.chinese: 传统地，蒙古国人民在那达慕节要聚集欢宴几天。

sentences.english: Following the fall of the Soviet Union, Mongolia adopted electoral politics.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古国在苏联解体后实施选举政治制度。

sentences.english: This year the firm entered the Balkans and Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 今年，该公司进驻巴尔干半岛各国和蒙古国。

sentences.english: Mongolia is split in to 21 provinces (aimag).
The Mongolian heartland consists of relatively flat steppes.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古国的心脏地带是相对平稳的干草原。

sentences.english: There he established a fresh Mongol state called the Kingdom of the Great Mughals .
sentences.chinese: 他在那里建立了一个叫大莫卧儿王国的新蒙古国。

sentences.english: Mr. Biden departs on Monday for Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 拜登将于下周一结束访华，前往蒙古国。

sentences.english: An aerial view of Ulan Bator's Sukhbaatar Square shows the Mongolian Parliament.
sentences.chinese: 乌兰巴托苏赫巴托广场的鸟瞰图，展示了蒙古国会。

sentences.english: ALLEN I'm wanted for pederasty in Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 我因娈童而在蒙古国遭到通缉。

definition: Ulaanbaatar or Ulan Bator, capital of Mongolia

pinyin: Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3

definition: Erlianhaote city in Xilin Gol league 錫林郭勒盟|锡林郭勒盟[Xi1 lin2 guo1 le4 meng2], Inner Mongolia
Xilin Gol league, a prefecture level subdivision of Inner Mongolia

pinyin: Meng3 gu3 Ren2 min2 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: Mongol ethnic group of north China and Inner Mongolia
Erlianhaote city in Xilin Gol league 錫林郭勒盟|锡林郭勒盟[Xi1 lin2 guo1 le4 meng2], Inner Mongolia
Manzhouli county level city, Mongolian Manzhuur xot, in Hulunbuir 呼倫貝爾|呼伦贝尔[Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3], Inner Mongolia
Inner Mongolia autonomous region, abbr. 內蒙古|内蒙古[Nei4 meng3 gu3], capital Hohhot 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4]
